actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to improve and expand benefits for active duty military personnel and their dependents.
short_title: Military Family Bill of Rights Act of 1985

summary.text: Military Family Bill of Rights Act of 1985 - Directs the Secretary of Defense to use appropriated but unused Department of Defense funds for: (1) increased mileage reimbursement travel allowances; (2) travel lodging expenses; and (3) moving expenses. Limits the use of such funds for the above purposes to the lesser of 50 percent of such funds or $250,000,000. Removes restrictions on dental care coverage for spouses and children of military personnel. Establishes in the Department of Defense an Office of Military Family Services to provide counseling and information services.

titles.title: Military Family Bill of Rights Act of 1985
A bill to improve and expand benefits for active duty military personnel and their dependents.
